QuestData.Title: Aiding the Accord: The Hunt is On
QuestData.Description:
Our allies from the Ohn'ahran Plains have sent word-a request-for any and all who hunt these lands to lend their aid to their cause.
Whilst continuing your efforts across these Isles, pay a visit to our allies at one of their hunting camps and assist in their efforts.
There is much to be done. Best not delay.
QuestData.LogDescription: Assist the Maruuk on a Hunt within the Dragon Isles. Continue your efforts in aiding the Valdrakken Accord and their allies throughout the Dragon Isles.
